casebody.data:
BYRD, et al.
v.
FRANKLIN COUNTY. No. 462A14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 1, 2015. Aubrey S. Tomlinson, Jr., Louisburg, for Franklin County (NC). George B. Currin, Raleigh, for Byrd, Aaron, et al. Camden R. Webb, Raleigh, for Second Amendment Foundation, Inc.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 24th of June 2015 by Respondent:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of July 2015."

Respondent shall have up to and including the 3rd day of August 2015 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
